column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Ed - Thank yo very much for the 5-star review. We greatly appreciate it. Whenever we read guests' reviews that say our ramen reminds them of what they have had in Japan
column2: we beam with pride. Although our original recipes have been slightly modified to appeal to a more Western palate
column3: the essential DNA of our broths is purely Japanese. So on behalf of our back of house
column4: we thank you for your kind words
column5: and we hope you'll visit us again soon.
